https://creativedestructionmedia.com/news/business/2020/04/01/boris-johnson-to-pull-out-of-huawei-5g-contract-due-to-ccp-misinformation/
a recent shipment of test kits bound for the UK was found to be contaminated with coronavirus

The infected elements are “probes and primers,” the long, thin swabs that medical personnel use to collect samples from the nasal and oral cavities.

共匪已经突破底线了
